dynamicModelSelection.notes: Fully implemented with OpenRouter integration, zero hardcoded models

contextAwareModelRetrieval.notes: Language and repository size-based model selection working

ultraStrictFreshnessScoring.notes: 6-month cutoff implemented, models older than 6 months score 0/10

comparisonAgent.notes: Migrated to dynamic model selection, no hardcoded models

researcherService.notes: Context-aware research with dynamic model selection

deepWikiIntegration.notes: DeepWiki model selector updated, async import patterns fixed

translatorService.notes: Updated to use dynamic model configuration

buildSystem.notes: All TypeScript compilation passing, ESLint errors resolved

codeQuality.notes: Zero ESLint errors, modern async/await patterns implemented

bugs.description: Console statement warnings in research and scheduler files (202 warnings)
8 test failures related to missing DeepWiki dependencies
Missing positive points system - resolved issues should add +5/+3/+1/+0.5 points
"Found 0 Code Quality Issues" reports are suspicious - need to verify DeepWiki integration
Base score storage not working - multiple runs against same user/PR show "New User Base"
Score Impact Breakdown shows old scoring (-20/-10/-5/-2) instead of new system (-5/-3/-1/-0.5)
Skills by category table shows inconsistent scoring with hardcoded -10/-20 instead of new calculated values
Educational insights section not syncing with actual found issues - shows generic advice instead of specific guidance
Missing permanent regression test suite - features have been re-implemented 3-4 times due to lack of proper test coverage and validation infrastructure

Critical regression test suite implementation required - comprehensive testing against multiple real PRs from different repositories and languages, integrated with dev-cycle-orchestrator for pre-commit validation and automated rollback
Outdated model name appearing in comparison reports - hardcoded fallbacks not syncing with ModelVersionSync database
Manual PR validation times out on large repositories - DeepWiki analysis exceeds timeout limits for repos like angular/angular, tensorflow, kubernetes

nextTasks: FIX BUG-019: Implement timeout handling and large repository optimization for manual PR validation
FIX BUG-018: Fix model name display in reports - sync with ModelVersionSync database instead of hardcoded fallbacks
FIX BUG-017: Implement comprehensive regression test suite with multi-language validation against real PRs
FIX BUG-016: Establish comprehensive regression test suite with immutable validation infrastructure
FIX BUG-010: Implement positive points system (+5/+3/+1/+0.5 for resolved issues)
FIX BUG-011: Verify DeepWiki integration for "Found 0 Code Quality Issues" reports
FIX BUG-012: Fix base score storage to persist user scores across runs
FIX BUG-013: Update Score Impact Breakdown to use new scoring system (-5/-3/-1/-0.5)
FIX BUG-014: Update Skills by category table with correct calculated scoring
FIX BUG-015: Sync educational insights with actual found issues
Fix DeepWiki client dependencies for test completion
Address TypeScript interface mismatches in educational agent
Integrate educational agent with dynamic model selection
Add line numbers to comparison report generation
Clean up console statement warnings in logging
